full_summary:
# W4M00-23C381 - Grass Cutting and Landscaping Services

## Contract Details
### Reference Number
Reference Number: WS4048249531-Doc4048342506

### Solicitation Number
Solicitation Number: WS4048249531

### Tender Details
#### Tender Title
Tender Title: W4M00-23C381 - Grass Cutting and Landscaping services

#### Tender Type
Tender Type: Request for Proposal

#### Award Type
Award Type: Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Contract Value
Contract Value: To be determined

#### Duration
Contract Start Date: 2023-09-01
Contract End Date: 2025-08-31

## Contract Requirements
### Landscaping Services
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the provision of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary to maintain designated areas on an "as and when requested" basis at various sites throughout Canadian Forces Base (CFB) at 17 Wing in Manitoba.

### Mandatory Site Visit
A mandatory site visit will be held at Building 100, Canadian Forces Base at 17 Wing Winnipeg, 715 Wihuri Road, Winnipeg, MB, R3J 3Y9 on Thursday, August 24, 2023, beginning at 9:00 am CDT. Offerors must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than Close of Business on Tuesday, August 22, 2023, to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of their representatives.

### Submission Deadline
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 pm EDT on September 6, 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

## Contracting Entity
### Name
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
Contractor:
Tanya Gostev
Email: tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Publication Date: 2023-07-26
Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-06T14:00:00
